name: Sonic Adventure (itch)
description:
This is a project created for the Sonic Fan Works Game Jam as a celebration of Sonic the Hedgehog's 30th birthday. It was made by my daughter as she learned how to code in the Pico-8 engine. Many thanks go to MBoffin and his guide on creating Pico-8 Adventure games.

I did very little to help other than provide context on game design elements and test the game. I'm very proud of what she has accomplished on her own.

The game's description from the creator herself:

"A fun little adventure game with Sonic and his friends."
